snippet: A Tibetan man in his 20s set himself on fire in a village near Lhasa, the Tibetan capital, according to reports by Radio Free Asia and Free Tibet, an advocacy group.
lead_paragraph: A Tibetan man in his 20s set himself on fire in a village near Lhasa, the Tibetan capital, according to reports by Radio Free Asia and Free Tibet, an advocacy group.

headline.main: China: 43rd Tibetan Sets Himself on Fire
headline.print_headline: China: 43rd Tibetan Sets Himself on Fire
